Key:
I'm done with errands. Now I've got plenty
of time to go on a date.

I wonder if Kotori's already home. I guess
I could stop by the house.
Huh...? A transmission from the Fraxinus?
Hey, Shido-kun. How are you?

Kannazuki-san...? What's the matter?
Is something wrong?
You see... I would love it if you could\nassist me with something, Shido-kun.
What is it?

Well... I would like to ask you to
participate in an experiment.
Uh... I have a bad feeling about this.
Now, don't be like that. It's an important\nexperiment that could determine the\nfuture of the Fraxinus.
So, what kind of experiment is it?
Well, I have personally put a lot of thought\ninto developing a new date A.I. system...
Personally...?
The Fraxinus' ship A.I. is highly advanced,\nbut just in case it shuts down, we will need\na back-up plan, or else...!
Should that happen, I was thinking of having\na failsafe system developed.

Uh. I've got a seriously bad feeling about
this.
Now, now. Don't be like that! You will be\nfully supported and protected by the Fraxinus'\nprized technicians.

How is that supposed to comfort me?!
What system is it, anyway?
It's based on the ultimate moe game.\nA title they say will stand the test of time.
It's considered to be a masterpiece of the\ntsundere genre. It's called, Big Brother, Bad!"

From the name alone, it doesn't sound
like a healthy game!
Come now, don't be like that...\nThe commander approved it herself.
What... Kotori has?
That's right. The commander gave her approval\nof this system in case of emergency.

(Kotori did...? If that's true, will there be
consequences if I fail to comply...?)

Um, so this simulation... When do I have
to do it, and who's the target?
Immediately, of course! And the target\nis our idol, the commander!
Why does this feel rigged to fail?!
It'll be fine! The commander's already\nreturned home!
What...? O-Oh, I see...
The commander gave the go-ahead whenever\nyou're ready. Please, give it your all.

Okay... So I should head over to Kotori's
place...?
Thank you!
(To be honest, I'm terrified...)
Hey, Kotori...?
What is it...?
(Whoa... She already looks cranky.)
Kannazuki-san, I've made it to Kotori's.
Understood. Location: Home.\nTime: Pre-supper. Prepping!\nOne moment, please!
Hey, what are you sneaking around for?
O-Oh... Nothing.
Ohhh! The simulated results have generated!\nYou'll have one of two choices...
One, I can't fight these feelings. Hug her!\nTwo, see me for who I really am. Strip down!\nOkay Shido-kun, go ahead and choose!
What... the heck?!

Hey! I'm the one who should be saying that!
You call for me, and you've got nothing to say?
Shido-kun, act quickly. The commander is\nangry...
...Argh!
I can't fight these feelings. Hug her!
See me for who I really am. Strip down!
K-Kotori... I'm sorry!
Aaah!
K-Kotori, is this okay?!

Wh-What are you talking about?!
You freaking pervert!
GAH!
Wh-What's gotten into you?!

W-Well, Kannazuki-san said he's performing
an experiment for a new A.I. system...

Experiment? New A.I. system? Kannazuki?
Y-You... went along with his experiment to
subject me to this...?
Yeah. I heard you approved it.

I only approved this supposed new system,
but I didn't bother to hear all the details.
S-Sorry...
Anyways, Shido...
Yes, imouto-sama?
There will be no next time. Remember that.
O...O...Okay...
The commander's cold gaze, coupled with\nher scathing response. Incredible! This\nsystem is already yielding fantastic results!

Excuse me?! Wait, the purpose of this
system is...
Obviously, it's an intuitive simulation\nplatform designed to coax extreme\nemotional responses from women!
GET RID OF IT THIS INSTANT!
K-Kotori... I want you to see all of me!

What the—? Wh-Why are you taking your
clothes off?!
K-Kotori! D-Do you like this?!
Wh-What are you talking about?! You pervert!
GAH!
Wh-What has gotten into you?!

W-Well, Kannazuki-san said he's performing
an experiment for a new A.I. system...

Experiment? New A.I. system? Kannazuki?
Y-You... went along with his experiment to
subject me to this...?
Yeah. I heard you approved it.

I only approved this supposed new system,
but I didn't bother to hear all the details.

But I was given the options either to hug you,
or strip off my clothes, so I figured at least
taking off my clothes would only embarrass me.
So, you chose to remove your clothing?

Y-Yeah... I thought it'd be better than
forcing contact onto you.

B-But you've hugged me plenty of times...
You idiot.
Man, she stormed off...

Besides, how the hell did I end up like this?
Hey, wait! I thought this was a simulation,
Kannazuki-san?!
Obviously, it's an intuitive simulation\nplatform designed to coax extreme\nemotional responses from women!
I got the butt end of the stick here!!
